*******link del problema:
https://uva.onlinejudge.org/index.php?option=com_onlinejudge&Itemid=8&page=show_problem&problem=535
*******Accepted:
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n;
	while(cin>>n){
		int r=0;
		for(int i=0;i<4;i++){
			r=(r<<8)|((n>>(8*i))&255);
		}
		cout<<n<<" converts to "<<r<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
*******Observacion del proceso:
n=                      00000111010110111100110100010101
n>>(8*i)                00000111010110111100110100010101
(n>>(8*i))&255          00000000000000000000000000010101
(y<<8)                  00000000000000000000000000000000
(y<<8)|((n>>(8*i))&255) 00000000000000000000000000010101
n=                      00000111010110111100110100010101
n>>(8*i)                00000000000001110101101111001101
(n>>(8*i))&255          00000000000000000000000011001101
(y<<8)                  00000000000000000001010100000000
(y<<8)|((n>>(8*i))&255) 00000000000000000001010111001101
n=                      00000111010110111100110100010101
n>>(8*i)                00000000000000000000011101011011
(n>>(8*i))&255          00000000000000000000000001011011
(y<<8)                  00000000000101011100110100000000
(y<<8)|((n>>(8*i))&255) 00000000000101011100110101011011
n=                      00000111010110111100110100010101
n>>(8*i)                00000000000000000000000000000111
(n>>(8*i))&255          00000000000000000000000000000111
(y<<8)                  00010101110011010101101100000000
(y<<8)|((n>>(8*i))&255) 00010101110011010101101100000111
123456789 365779719
*******Explicacion:
Si se tiene este numero : 11111111 00000000 10101010 01010101
Se busca esto		: 01010101 10101010 00000000 11111111
*******
